Name: Swift Response
Story Background: In the heat of battle, a quick response can mean the difference between victory and defeat. This spell was developed by the Boros Legion to give their soldiers an edge in combat.
Ability: Instantly destroy target attacking or blocking creature with power 2 or less.
Appearance Description: The card art depicts a Boros soldier leaping into action, sword raised high, ready to strike down any foe that dares to challenge them. The background is a fiery battlefield, with smoke and flames billowing all around.
